name: Sentience
description:
In Sentience, you must become the hunter or the hunted in this multiplayer stealth title. Use your intelligence and blend in with the AI to make your escape. Or, keep your eyes peeled for AI acting strangely to uphold the status quo.


Game features:

  • Play as either Sentinel (hunters) or Rogue (hunted): Each with unique abilities and playstyles.
  • Multiplayer round-based cooperative gameplay: Compete with other players online, or offline against the AI.
  • Social features: Connect and play with friends and other players.
  • Free-to-play: With upgradeable cosmetic features.

Sentience offers a unique take on the beloved stealth multiplayer genre with its sci-fi cyberpunk-dystopian setting.
